description: footSoldiers, horseMen, and armyOfTheDead are each an array

code:
let swordMen = []
let archers = []
let captains = []
let generals = []
const pushCalls = saveArguments(Array.prototype, 'push')

// Your code

equal(pushCalls.length, 0) // push should not be used

let swordMen = []
let archers = []
let captains = []
let generals = []
const unshiftCalls = saveArguments(Array.prototype, 'unshift')

// Your code

equal(unshiftCalls.length, 0) // unshift should not be used

let swordMen = []
let archers = []
let captains = []
let generals = []
const concatCalls = saveArguments(Array.prototype, 'concat')

// Your code

equal(concatCalls.length, 0) // concat should not be used

let swordMen = [
  'Jack Churchill',
  'Sasaki Kojiro',
  'Johannes Liechtenauer',
  'Fiore dei Liberi',
]
let archers = ['William Tell', 'Artemis', 'Fred Bear', 'Nasu no Yoichi']
let captains = ['Guts', 'Edward the Black Prince', 'Joan of Arc']
let generals = ['Napoleon', 'Emilia Plater']

// Your code

equal(footSoldiers.length, 9)

description: Grim the Terrible is behind his footSoldiers
code:
let swordMen = [
  'Jack Churchill',
  'Sasaki Kojiro',
  'Johannes Liechtenauer',
  'Fiore dei Liberi',
]
let archers = ['William Tell', 'Artemis', 'Fred Bear', 'Nasu no Yoichi']
let captains = ['Guts', 'Edward the Black Prince', 'Joan of Arc']
let generals = ['Napoleon', 'Emilia Plater']

// Your code

equal(footSoldiers, [
  'Jack Churchill',
  'Sasaki Kojiro',
  'Johannes Liechtenauer',
  'Fiore dei Liberi',
  'William Tell',
  'Artemis',
  'Fred Bear',
  'Nasu no Yoichi',
  'Grim the Terrible',
])

]

let captains = ['Guts', 'Edward the Black Prince', 'Joan of Arc']
let generals = ['Napoleon', 'Emilia Plater']

// Your code

equal(horseMen.length, 6)

description: The Skull Knight is in front of his horseMen
code:
let swordMen = [
  'Jack Churchill',
  'Sasaki Kojiro',
  'Johannes Liechtenauer',
  'Fiore dei Liberi',
]
let archers = ['William Tell', 'Artemis', 'Fred Bear', 'Nasu no Yoichi']
let captains = ['Guts', 'Edward the Black Prince', 'Joan of Arc']
let generals = ['Napoleon', 'Emilia Plater']

equal(horseMen, [
  'The Skull Knight',
  'Guts',
  'Edward the Black Prince',
  'Joan of Arc',
  'Napoleon',
  'Emilia Plater',
])

let swordMen = [
  'Jack Churchill',
  'Sasaki Kojiro',
  'Johannes Liechtenauer',
  'Fiore dei Liberi',
]
let archers = ['William Tell', 'Artemis', 'Fred Bear', 'Nasu no Yoichi']
let captains = ['Guts', 'Edward the Black Prince', 'Joan of Arc']
let generals = ['Napoleon', 'Emilia Plater']

// Your code

equal(armyOfTheDead.length, 16)

description: The King of the Dead is in between footSoldiers and horseMen
code:
let swordMen = [
  'Jack Churchill',
  'Sasaki Kojiro',
  'Johannes Liechtenauer',
  'Fiore dei Liberi',
]
let archers = ['William Tell', 'Artemis', 'Fred Bear', 'Nasu no Yoichi']
let captains = ['Guts', 'Edward the Black Prince', 'Joan of Arc']
let generals = ['Napoleon', 'Emilia Plater']

equal(armyOfTheDead, [
  'Jack Churchill',
  'Sasaki Kojiro',
  'Johannes Liechtenauer',
  'Fiore dei Liberi',
  'William Tell',
  'Artemis',
  'Fred Bear',
  'Nasu no Yoichi',
  'Grim the Terrible',
  'The King of the Dead',
  'The Skull Knight',
  'Guts',
  'Edward the Black Prince',
  'Joan of Arc',
  'Napoleon',
  'Emilia Plater',
])

description: The army of the dead is still ordered if the soldiers are different
code:
let swordMen = [
  'Zorro',
  'Sasaki Kojiro',
  'Johannes Liechtenauer',
  'Fiore dei Liberi',
]
let archers = [
  'William Tell',
  'Artemis',
  'Fred Bear',
  'Nasu no Yoichi',
  'Rambo',
]
let captains = ['Price', 'Guts', 'Edward the Black Prince', 'Joan of Arc']
let generals = ['Queen Elizabeth II', 'Emilia Plater']

// Your code

equal(armyOfTheDead, [
  'Zorro',
  'Sasaki Kojiro',
  'Johannes Liechtenauer',
  'Fiore dei Liberi',
  'William Tell',
  'Artemis',
  'Fred Bear',
  'Nasu no Yoichi',
  'Rambo',
  'Grim the Terrible',
  'The King of the Dead',
  'The Skull Knight',
  'Price',
  'Guts',
  'Edward the Black Prince',
  'Joan of Arc',
  'Queen Elizabeth II',
  'Emilia Plater',
])
